name: 3D Limo Parking Simulator Game
description:
Get your Chauffeurs hat on and Get Ready to Cruise with VIP's in Limo Parking Simulator!
• Featuring 5 different Limousines to Master: from Long, to RIDICULOUSLY Long! Can YOU Handle them ALL?!
• 3 Realistic Maps: Experience the Delights and Wonders of Venice, Italy!
• 45 level Career Mode: From San Marco's Square to the quaint Shopping Streets, the tight spaces of "Venezia" will Challenge the Finest of Chauffeurs!
• A variety of "Precision Driving" Challenges in your Career Mode: reverse parking, three-point turns, negotiating bridges and tight corners. Finally the Ultimate Challenge - driving on raised platforms only just wide enough for your car!
• Race for the Best times with Realistic Handling Limos! We've given you the tools - now go prove you can use them!

•• GAME FEATURES ••
• 5 Cool "Stretched" cars
• 3 Detailed 3D Maps
• Massive 45 level Career Mode
• Tilt, digital or Wheel steering
• Selectable camera views including Bumper Cam and Real Rear View Mirrors!
• Unlockable Modes including Fun Mode, Kids Mode and Baby Modes available as IAP to adjust the rules to your liking for an easier ride!
